protein.specific_function: NCF2, NCF1, and a membrane bound cytochrome b558 are required for activation of the latent NADPH oxidase (necessary for superoxide production)

reference.reference_text: Leto TL, Lomax KJ, Volpp BD, Nunoi H, Sechler JM, Nauseef WM, Clark RA, Gallin JI, Malech HL: Cloning of a 67-kD neutrophil oxidase factor with similarity to a noncatalytic region of p60c-src. Science. 1990 May 11;248(4956):727-30.
